item.title: Redirect to widyamedia.indonesiadot.com
item.description: Actually this should be done long time ago, i thought it would be better if i wrote some of my experiences / experiments in public space like blogspot or wordpress, but with custom domain to be readable by all of people around the world :) And here are the steps for redirecting to widyamedia.indonesiadot.com * login to blogger.com or register if you don’t have one * select the account you wanna manage and choose Settings - Basic from left menu
